title: ‘Like working in a volcano’: stories from six countries in Europe on a day of extreme heat

content:

title: Australian PM vows 'full force of law' after arson attack at Melbourne synagogue
description: “Antisemitism has no place in Australia,” Anthony Albanese said after the latest in a string of attacks.
content:
Australia's prime minister has promised to take strong action following an apparent arson attack on a synagogue in Melbourne.
Police are looking for a man who poured liquid on the synagogue's front door before setting it on fire on Friday night. Some... [350 chars]

title: Reform MP suspends himself from party over allegations around his business affairs
description: Reform chief whip Lee Anderson said the suspension concerns allegations around James McMurdock's business affairs published in a national newspaper.
content:
Reform MP James McMurdock has suspended himself from the party.
In a statement, Reform chief whip Lee Anderson said it is over allegations around his business affairs published in a national newspaper.

title: Lisa Nandy questions lack of BBC sackings over Gaza war documentary
description: Culture secretary says BBC must ‘get a grip’ in wake of film featuring son of Hamas official and Bob Vylan Glastonbury row
content:
The culture secretary, Lisa Nandy, has demanded to know why no one at the BBC has lost their job over the airing of a documentary on Gaza that featured the son of a Hamas official.
